name: Creamy Chicken and Butterbean Casserole
author: Slimming World
ingredients:
- 6 skinless, boneless chicken thighs
- 6 smoked back bacon rashers, roughly chopped
- 1 large leek, thinly sliced
- 2 bsp plain flour
- 600ml chicken stock
- finely grated zest and juice of 1 lemon
- 2 tbsp chopped fresh tarragon
- 400g can butter beans, drained and rinsed
instructions:
- In a casserole dish, brown the chicken thighs in a little oil, and set aside.
- Add the bacon to the dish and cook for 3-4 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add the white of the leek and cook for 1 minute, then sprinkle over the flour, pour in the stock and stir to combine.
- Bring to the boil, and add the cooked chicken. Add the lemon zest, lemon juice and tarragon to the pot, cover, and cook over a low heat for 45 minutes.
- Uncover, add the green leeks and butter beans and simmer for another 20 minutes.
- Season to taste and serve with mashed potatoes and greens.
